{{Infobox dungeon |name = Cerulean Cave |image = [[File:Cerulean Cave.png|400px]] |caption = An overhead map of Cerulean Cave. |tokens = 2,500 |location = North of Cerulean City. }} '''Cerulean Cave''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. ==Dungeon Stats== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !!
